1: Nice pool and hot tub just wish the pool would have had step down entrance instead of ladders on side
The hotel was nice however the pool facilities were subpar for a hotel of this size

With wonderful views from the top floors a posh lobby indoor pool and upscale rooms this Hyat stands high literally
I liked the overall cleanliness and convenience of having gym pool restaurants etc
The pool and hot tub were very relaxing and clean which made the stay even more enjoyable
I was able to book a Panoramic View room for 5 nights through htwire for a 125 a night as this is the only hotel in this class in the area with an indoor pool
